title: Race detected in eth/downloader.(*Downloader).processFastSyncContent() reproduced by TestFastSyncDisabling
body:
`go version go1.10.2 linux/amd64`

Checked against latest master at ea06da089264508601a9f967160b8c7f335071fa.

To reproduce:
